div.p: We thank the General Directorate for Agriculture of the Lombardy Region (D.G. Agricoltura della Regione Lombardia) and the Regional Agency for Agricultural and Forestry Development (ERSAF, Ente Regionale per lo Sviluppo Agricolo e Forestale) for co‐funding bird data collection since 1992 through the monitoring project of breeding birds in Lombardy, also financed by the Research Fund of the University of Milano‐Bicocca. We thank Monica Carabella, Lucio Bordignon, Sergio Mantovani, Matteo Bonetti, Alberto Forelli, and other surveyors for their help with field data collection. We are grateful to Matteo Bonetti for language revision. Special thanks to Professor Renato Massa, who first conceived and started the monitoring project of breeding birds in Lombardy.
